name: CongenitalCytomegalovirusTestsForCMVNucleicAcidInAmnioticFluidByNAAT
title: Congenital Cytomegalovirus (Tests for CMV Nucleic Acid in Amniotic Fluid by NAAT)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Cytomegalovirus in nucleic acid testing.),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: Cytomegalovirus NAA),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
